sqlMap.select: select count(*) from apogee.resultat_vet where cod_etp = #code# and cod_vrs_vet = #version# and cod_anu = #annee#
select lib_web_vet from version_etape where cod_etp = #code# and cod_vrs_vet = #version#

select i.cod_ind,i.cod_etu, i.lib_nom_pat_ind, i.lib_pr1_ind, to_char(i.date_nai_ind,'DD/MM/YYYY') date_nai_ind, decode(rj.tem_iae_ko_vet,0,'O','N') iae from apogee.individu i , apogee.resultat_vet rj where rj.tem_iae_ko_vet in ('0','2') and rj.cod_etp = #code# and rj.cod_vrs_vet = #version# and rj.cod_anu = #annee# and rj.cod_ses in ('0','1') and rj.cod_adm = '1' and i.cod_ind = rj.cod_ind order by i.lib_nom_pat_ind,i.lib_pr1_ind,i.date_nai_ind

select i.cod_ind,i.cod_etu, i.lib_nom_pat_ind, i.lib_pr1_ind, to_char(i.date_nai_ind,'DD/MM/YYYY') date_nai_ind, decode(rj.tem_iae_ko_vet,0,'O','N') iae, nvl(decode(to_char(rj.not_vet),null,rj.not_sub_vet,to_char(rj.not_vet)),' ') notej , nvl(rj.cod_tre,' ') resj from apogee.individu i , apogee.resultat_vet rj where rj.tem_iae_ko_vet in ('0','2') and rj.cod_etp = #code# and rj.cod_vrs_vet = #version# and rj.cod_anu = #annee# and rj.cod_ses in ('0','1') and rj.cod_adm = '1' and i.cod_ind = rj.cod_ind order by i.lib_nom_pat_ind,i.lib_pr1_ind,i.date_nai_ind

select i.cod_ind,i.cod_etu, i.lib_nom_pat_ind, i.lib_pr1_ind, to_char(i.date_nai_ind,'DD/MM/YYYY') date_nai_ind, decode(rj.tem_iae_ko_vet,0,'O','N') iae, nvl(decode(to_char(rs.not_vet),null,rs.not_sub_vet,to_char(rs.not_vet)),' ') notes , nvl(rs.cod_tre,' ') ress from apogee.individu i , apogee.resultat_vet rj left outer join apogee.resultat_vet rs on ( rs.cod_ind = rj.cod_ind and rs.tem_iae_ko_vet in ('0','2') and rs.cod_etp = rj.cod_etp and rs.cod_vrs_vet = rj.cod_vrs_vet and rs.cod_anu = rj.cod_anu and rs.cod_ses = '2' and rs.cod_adm = '1') where rj.tem_iae_ko_vet in ('0','2') and rj.cod_etp = #code# and rj.cod_vrs_vet = #version# and rj.cod_anu = #annee# and rj.cod_ses in ('0','1') and rj.cod_adm = '1' and i.cod_ind = rj.cod_ind order by i.lib_nom_pat_ind,i.lib_pr1_ind,i.date_nai_ind

select i.cod_ind,i.cod_etu, i.lib_nom_pat_ind, i.lib_pr1_ind, to_char(i.date_nai_ind,'DD/MM/YYYY') date_nai_ind, decode(rj.tem_iae_ko_vet,0,'O','N') iae, nvl(decode(to_char(rj.not_vet),null,rj.not_sub_vet,to_char(rj.not_vet)),' ') notej , nvl(rj.cod_tre,' ') resj , nvl(decode(to_char(rs.not_vet),null,rs.not_sub_vet,to_char(rs.not_vet)),' ') notes , nvl(rs.cod_tre,' ') ress from apogee.individu i , apogee.resultat_vet rj left outer join apogee.resultat_vet rs on ( rs.cod_ind = rj.cod_ind and rs.tem_iae_ko_vet in ('0','2') and rs.cod_etp = rj.cod_etp and rs.cod_vrs_vet = rj.cod_vrs_vet and rs.cod_anu = rj.cod_anu and rs.cod_ses = '2' and rs.cod_adm = '1') where rj.tem_iae_ko_vet in ('0','2') and rj.cod_etp = #code# and rj.cod_vrs_vet = #version# and rj.cod_anu = #annee# and rj.cod_ses in ('0','1') and rj.cod_adm = '1' and i.cod_ind = rj.cod_ind order by i.lib_nom_pat_ind,i.lib_pr1_ind,i.date_nai_ind

select vfv.cod_etp, vfv.cod_vrs_vet, ve.lib_web_vet from vdi_fractionner_vet vfv, etape e,version_etape ve, version_diplome vdi where (#anneeencours# >= vfv.DAA_DEB_RCT_VET and vfv.DAA_FIN_RCT_VET >= #anneeencours#) and e.cod_etp = vfv.cod_etp and ve.cod_etp = e.cod_etp and ve.cod_vrs_vet = vfv.cod_vrs_vet and vdi.cod_dip = vfv.cod_dip and vdi.cod_vrs_vdi = vfv.cod_vrs_vdi and vdi.cod_dip = #code# and vdi.cod_vrs_vdi = #version# order by ve.lib_web_vet

select LIB_WEB_VET from ins_adm_etp ins, etape e, version_etape ve where e.cod_etp = ins.cod_etp and ve.cod_etp = e.cod_etp and ve.cod_vrs_vet = ins.cod_vrs_vet and ins.cod_ind = #value# and eta_iae = 'E' ORDER BY COD_ANU DESC
